data.message:
I Love It.. If it's in My Budget ima Get it!! LoL 😆
Humans are very #Fickle #Creatures.. I'd Like to See All the #Haters make a #Video of themselves.. with No #Music Make a Tight rope of #Words, from Twine.. And Not No, #Mumble shit either!! I want to hear it Loud and Clear What Yall really have to Say!! Then try to Find Some #Sounds.. To Merge in. And It needs to Be Felt, like from across the #Universe it Speaks too someone.. Makes Them #Grateful too be Alive! Post it on You Tube, Send it To #Trump!! Y'all ain't Ever Seen a #Hurricane on a #Volcano.. but if You ain't Got Nothing Nice To Say, Then Dont get on this MF Page.. Best #Believe this #BeautifulPain, BaBy will put #Speedom on ya.. LoL This #Art, That #MarshallMathers shares with yall is from his #Courage to be Eminem to y'all like #TrumanShow .. but Yes he has a #Shady side.. like WE ALL Do.. Normal is a setting on the dryer.. we don't get that.. we are the #Outcasts NFrealMusic the ones that #Society Says is #OutOfControl YelaWolf 😜 We are the #DefiantOnes with #Survival #Instincts that keep #Humainty #Evolving! Love It or Fuck Off! Ur #Choice ?
